enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve manipulating the state of the flags, which is crucial for the toString method to produce accurate results.
Both methods involve manipulating the state of the flags, which is crucial for the toString method to produce accurate results.

The toString method's output can be verified by checking if specific flags are off, which is similar to the behavior of the isOff method.
